title: jerry0
author: jerry0
content: On ledger site when making order, it ask for your email address.  A while back i did order and used same email.  As of now i even get those ledger emails.Going to use the same email and there is option to checkLedger collects and processes your persoal data to manage your orderI consent to receiving emails from Ledger about products, updates, and industry news.Do I check that or not?  My email already gets those emails.  I must have check it last time?Seems like check no check order would probably go through?

comments.author: bitbollo
comments.body: potentially, if you are interested, check the option even if it has already been made for a first purchase. usually for this type of purchase/subscription a secondary email is used... I refer to the secondary email because they should also spam or these emails potentially can be used without consent (by a third part) it will not change anything in terms of security.
